Privacy Protection Guidelines Update Tips
Thank you for using the QQ browser!
In order to better protect your rights and interests, we have recently updated the "Guidelines for Privacy Protection of QQ Browser".
label: Policy Change

text: The content of this update is:
label: Policy Change

text: 1. In section 1 "The Information we collect", we will introduce our newly added tool equity cards and personal information collection and use in paid services;
label: Policy Change

text: The collection and usage of sensors;
label: Policy Change

text: Log in to QQ Music directly play the collection and use of personal information involved in the music function in the QQ browser search results;
label: Policy Change

text: Personal information collection and use during the trial cloud game.
label: Policy Change

text: 2. In the "Information Security" section in Section 3, the QQ browser has introduced the evaluation and filing of the national communication network security protection level (level 3).
label: Policy Change

text: Please read carefully before using/continue to use the QQ browser product and/or service, fully understand the full text, and use/continue to use after agreeing with all the content.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Please read carefully before using/continue to use the QQ browser product and/or service, fully understand the full text, and use/continue to use after agreeing with all the content.

text: preface

We know the importance of personal information to you. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations, follow the principles of privacy protection, and provide you with more secure and reliable services.

(1) QQ browser is a browser -like product provided by Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "Us").The 35th floor of Tencent Building all the way, at the same time, we will also jointly operate with affiliated companies during the product operation process.
If you have any questions or concerns about this guideline or related issues, please contact us through the contact information provided by "Contact Us" in section 11 of this guideline.
label: Contact Information

text: (2) This privacy protection guide is suitable for all terminal clients such as the QQ browser PC side, APP (including but not limited to iOS version, Android version), iPad, and applet (hereinafter referred to as "platform")Various products and services provided by you.
If a client or an application software version has special features or special personal information processing activities, we will explain it.

For example, our client, products and/or services have set up a privacy policy/privacy agreement separately, and a separate privacy policy/privacy agreement is preferentially applied to the guidelines for privacy protection;
The content of the privacy policy/privacy agreement is not mentioned, and the guidelines for privacy protection are applied.

Please note that this privacy protection guide is not suitable for any third -party application or software integrated with our platform, products and/or services, or any other third -party product, service or business (collectively referred to as "third -party services").

Third -party services are operated by third -party services. If you use third -party services, you should comply with the privacy policy or other personal information processing rules formulated by the third party for this.Check the relevant rules carefully before.

(3) In response to the terms involving a significant relationship with you (possibilities) and the processing of sensitive personal information, we will adopt a rough, down line or other reasonable ways in this guideline to remind you to read.
label: Data Security

text: (4) You agree that this guidelines say that you have understood and agreed that in related scenarios, we will process your relevant personal information in order to achieve functional operation.
label: Policy Change

text: But this does not mean that as long as you start using our products and/or services, we will process all the personal information involved in this guideline.
Only when you use specific functions, we will process your relevant personal information in order to achieve the purpose of providing you to you according to the "minimum necessary" principle.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Only when you use specific functions, we will process your relevant personal information in order to achieve the purpose of providing you to you according to the "minimum necessary" principle.

text: (5) In addition to this guideline, in specific scenarios, the way we will notify time (including but not limited to updating the guidelines, re -signing files, page prompts, pop -ups, in -site letters, emails, website announcements or other convenient facilities facilitatedThe way you know) will explain to you in detail the rules, methods, scope and other rules of the corresponding information, and process it after obtaining your authorization consent.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In specific scenarios, we will explain in detail the methods of the processing purpose, method, scope and other rules of the corresponding information in detail, and process it after obtaining your authorization consent.

text: This privacy protection guidelines will help you understand the following:
1. The information we collect

3. Information security

The information we collect and use

text: 8. Change
We may amend the guidelines for privacy protection in a timely manner.

When the terms of the guidelines for privacy protection are changed, we will prompt you the change of privacy protection guidelines to you in an appropriate manner in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, and explain the effective date of effect.

Please read the content of the privacy protection guidelines carefully, and you continue to use the QQ browser to indicate that you agree to deal with your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You continue to use the QQ browser to indicate that we agree to handle your personal information according to the updated privacy protection guidelines.

text: 9. Protection of minors
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.

According to the relevant laws and regulations, if you are a minor under the age of 18, you should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians before using the QQ browser product or service.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors under the age of 18 should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians before using QQ browser products or services.

text: According to the provisions of relevant laws and regulations, if you are a child under the age of 14, you should obtain your parents or legal guardians in advance before using the QQ browser product or service to obtain your parents or the legal guardian in accordance with the registration and use process.The legal guardian helps you complete the product or service registration process so that you can use the products or services we provide.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Children under 14 years of age should obtain the consent of your parents or legal guardians in advance before using the QQ browser product or service to obtain the product or service registration process in accordance with the registration and use process.Essence

text: If you are a child's guardian, when you help children complete the registration and use of products or services, you should carefully read the guidance of this privacy protection and the "Child Privacy Protection Statement"."And help children register and use so that children can use the products or services we provide.
label: Specific Audiences

text: If you have relevant questions or claims for your personal information protection of your child's personal information, please contact us through the contact information disclosed in part 11 of this privacy protection guideline.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: If you have relevant questions or claims for your personal information protection of your child's personal information, please contact us through the contact information disclosed in part 11 of this privacy protection guideline.

text: We will deal with and reply to you within a reasonable time.
10. Others
Tencent's "Privacy Policy" is a generally applicable general privacy clause, which specifies the user rights and information security guarantee measures for QQ browser.
For example, Tencent's "Privacy Policy" is inconsistent or contradictory with the guidance of this privacy protection, please refer to the guidelines of this privacy protection.
11. Contact us

We have set up a special person in personal information protection team and personal information protection person. If you have any questions or complaints or suggestions on the privacy policy or personal information protection related matters, you can contact us in the following ways:

Appendix: Definition

Personal information: Refers to various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other methods, excluding information after anonymous processing (from Article 4 of the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China).

Sensitive personal information: Once leaked or illegally, it is easy to cause personal information of natural person's personality dignity or harm to the safety of personal and property, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identities, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory and other information.And personal information under the age of 14 (from Article 28 of the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China).

Anonymous: It refers to the process of processing personal information that cannot be recognized by specific natural persons and cannot be restored (from Article 73 of the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China).

Decoration: It means that the personal information is processed, so that it cannot recognize the process of specific natural persons without using additional information (from Article 73 of the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China).
Related company: refers to a company that has a direct or indirect control or significant impact relationship with us.
Children: Refers to adults under the age of 14.
Processing personal information: Refers to the collection, storage, use, processing, transmission, provision, disclosure, deletion of personal information.

Automated decision -making: Refers to automatic analysis through computer programs, evaluating personal behavior habits, hobbies or economic, healthy, credit conditions, etc. (from Article 73 of the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China).

Cookie: Cookie is a small file containing string. When you log in and use your website or other network content, you send and store in your computer, mobile device or other devices (usually encrypted).
Similar cookies are other technologies that can be used in similar uses as Cookie, such as: Web Beacon, Proxy, Embedded Scripts, Pixel Tags, etc.
SSL: SSL (Secure Socket Layer), also known as convergence, is a security protocol implemented on the transmission communication protocol (TCP/IP).
SSL supports various types of networks, and also provides three basic security services. Both use public key and symmetrical key technology to achieve the effect of information confidentiality.
